tasks.task_description: 运行主脚本以获取指定股票（AAPL, MSFT, NVDA）的数据。
tasks.expected_output: Financial data for AAPL, MSFT, NVDA

tasks.task_title: Run main script with tickers and Ollama
tasks.task_description: 运行主脚本以获取指定股票（AAPL, MSFT, NVDA）的数据，并启用Ollama功能。
tasks.expected_output: Financial data for AAPL, MSFT, NVDA with Ollama

tasks.task_title: Run main script with date range
tasks.task_description: 运行主脚本以获取指定股票（AAPL, MSFT, NVDA）在特定日期范围内的数据。
tasks.expected_output: Financial data for AAPL, MSFT, NVDA from 2024-01-01 to 2024-03-01

tasks.task_description: 运行回测脚本以测试指定股票（AAPL, MSFT, NVDA）的投资策略。
tasks.expected_output: Backtest results for AAPL, MSFT, NVDA

docker_files..dockerignore:
# Git
.git
.gitignore

# Poetry
.venv
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class
.pytest_cache/

# Environment
.env

# IDEs and editors
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo

# Logs and data
logs/
data/
*.log

# OS specific
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

code_blocks:
# Create .env file for your API keys (in the root directory)
cp .env.example .env

# For running LLMs hosted by openai (gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, etc.)
OPENAI_API_KEY=your-openai-api-key

# For getting financial data to power the hedge fund
FINANCIAL_DATASETS_API_KEY=your-financial-datasets-api-key
